celestial

Class Celestial

  • java.lang.Object
    • celestial.Celestial
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Planet

    public class Celestial
extends java.lang.Object
    An object of class Celestial has 4 members, coordinate, color, name, radius. It has a default and a 4 parameter constructor, and getters and setters. It has also a draw method to draw the celestial on GUI.
